resp = client.indices.create(
    index="file-path-test",
    settings={
        "analysis": {
            "analyzer": {
                "custom_path_tree": {
                    "tokenizer": "custom_hierarchy"
                },
                "custom_path_tree_reversed": {
                    "tokenizer": "custom_hierarchy_reversed"
                }
            },
            "tokenizer": {
                "custom_hierarchy": {
                    "type": "path_hierarchy",
                    "delimiter": "/"
                },
                "custom_hierarchy_reversed": {
                    "type": "path_hierarchy",
                    "delimiter": "/",
                    "reverse": "true"
                }
            }
        }
    },
    mappings={
        "properties": {
            "file_path": {
                "type": "text",
                "fields": {
                    "tree": {
                        "type": "text",
                        "analyzer": "custom_path_tree"
                    },
                    "tree_reversed": {
                        "type": "text",
                        "analyzer": "custom_path_tree_reversed"
                    }
                }
            }
        }
    },
)
print(resp)
